cna.data

Class Alignment

  • java.lang.Object
    • cna.data.Alignment

  • public class Alignment
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an alignment in sam/bam format. Provides functionallity for efficient access to count data
    Author:
    Stefan Grabuschnig

                 Genome genome)
        Parameters:
        alignmentID - name of the alignment
        individual - individual to which the alignment belongs
        bamFile - path to the sam/bam file
        time - name of the time assigned to the alignment
        infectionState - name of the infection state
        genome - the respective genome
